short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An advanced tool to extract emails from web pages, including hidden emails, with options to download or copy the extracted emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of manually searching for emails on web pages? Let the Advanced Email Extractor do the work for you! 🚀

Key Features:
🔍 Efficient Email Extraction
Easily extract emails from visible text, mailto: links, and hidden elements on any web page. Our powerful algorithm ensures you never miss an email!

📊 Real-time Badge Update
Keep track of the number of extracted emails with our convenient badge feature, which updates in real-time as you browse.

📋 Copy, Download, and Manage Emails

- 𝐂𝐨𝐩𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐂𝐥𝐢𝐩𝐛𝐨𝐚𝐫𝐝: With a single click, copy all extracted emails to your clipboard for easy pasting.

- Download as 𝐂𝐒𝐕 or 𝐓𝐗𝐓 File: Export your extracted emails in CSV or TXT format for seamless data management.

- 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝐄𝐦𝐚𝐢𝐥 𝐋𝐢𝐬𝐭: Start fresh by clearing the list of extracted emails anytime.

🔄 Toggle Extension On/Off
Easily enable or disable the extension to suit your needs with just a click. The icon and interface update to reflect the current state of the extension.

🌟 User-Friendly Interface
Our sleek and intuitive design makes it simple to view, manage, and export your extracted emails. Rate our extension directly from the popup and share your feedback!

🔒 Privacy-Focused
Your data is safe with us. The emails extracted by the extension are stored locally on your device, ensuring your privacy.

How to Use:
✅Activate the Extension: Click on the extension icon in your browser toolbar.
✅Browse as Usual: Visit any web page, and the extension will automatically extract emails.
✅Manage Emails: Open the popup to view the list of extracted emails. Use the provided buttons to copy, download, or clear the emails.



👩‍💻About the Developer:
Developed Fatima Amjad, the Advanced Email Extractor is designed to save you time and effort in finding emails online. Your feedback is valuable to us.

Download now and streamline your email extraction process! 🚀
